name: capitalizing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
capitalize
capitalize verb
(LETTER)
[ T ] to write a letter of the alphabet as a capital, or to write the first letter of a word as a capital: The names of political parties are always capitalized, e.g. the Green Party.

capitalize verb
(MONEY)
[ T often passive ] to supply money to a business so that it can develop or operate as it should
